hero.title: Create Your Professional Portfolio Without Spending a Dime

hero.joinedUsers: Join 10,000+ freelancers who've already created their portfolios

features.title: Everything You Need, For Free
features.subtitle: We believe every freelancer deserves a professional online presence. That's why we made our portfolio builder completely free.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: Create and maintain your professional portfolio completely free. No hidden costs or premium features.

seo.title: SEO Optimized
seo.description: Get discovered by clients with our built-in SEO tools. Rank higher in search results naturally.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Built with Next.js for blazing-fast performance that impresses visitors and search engines alike.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.description: Your portfolio is protected with enterprise-grade security and hosted on reliable infrastructure.

templates.title: Beautiful Templates
templates.description: Choose from our collection of professionally designed templates that make your work shine.

setup.title: Quick Setup
setup.description: Get your portfolio online in minutes with our intuitive setup process. No technical skills needed.
